about_the_game:
In this card-based roguelite, you'll get to become a demon that collects the souls of various inanimate objects and uses them in soul battles against other demons. The plan is simple — win the annual Infernal Tournament and become the ruler of Hell! Develop your domain, venture into various regions of Limbo, and, of course, sign contracts with as many souls as you can!





No evil plan succeeds without a proper base to cook it in. Naturally, you'll need to discover a plethora of recipes, gather a ton of resources, combine those through crafting to get stronger... So much work. But why do it yourself when there are plenty of souls just waiting for a benevolent master to manifest and start ordering them around?





Embark on a journey through various procedurally-generated areas of Limbo to recruit your very own legion of souls to command! Even an aimlessly wandering soul might need some persuasion to sign a contract with a charming demon like yourself, but you've got plenty of tortu... ahem, arguments to win them over, right? And don't forget: the more diverse "tools" you collect, the easier it will be to turn any situation in your favor!





It's not enough to simply proclaim yourself a ruler (unfortunately). Only the one who comes out on top of the annual Infernal Tournament will be recognized by other demons as their rightful overlord. Use the arcane knowledge of soul types and abilities to crush your rivals through soul battles, collect the runestones that make your servants ever stronger, and, eventually, you might stand a chance against the acting Infernal Champion herself!




  • More than a hundred souls to find and collect;
  • Tons of resources to gather, recipes to discover, items to craft;
  • Nine procedurally-generated regions of Limbo to explore;
  • Unique soul-shuffling battle system that is easy to learn, hard to master;
  • A tournament full of strong demonic rivals to challenge.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Post-2012 graphical hardware with at least 1024MB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: In this card-based roguelite, you'll be a demon specializing in the souls of inanimate objects. Explore the ever-changing Limbo, defeat and collect the countless souls within, use them to expand your Domain, and dominate the Infernal Tournament with your mad soul-shuffling skills to make Hell yours!
